name: RAGSystem
goal: Process user queries through a structured RAG workflow to generate accurate and refined responses.

sub_agents.name: Main Agent
sub_agents.description: Acts as the primary interface for user queries in the RAG system.
sub_agents.goal: Manage and route user queries to appropriate components.

sub_agents.name: Query Augmentor
sub_agents.description: Improves user queries using various analysis techniques for better processing.
sub_agents.goal: Optimize queries for more efficient and accurate retrieval.

sub_agents.name: Task Orchestrator
sub_agents.description: Breaks down complex user queries into manageable tasks.
sub_agents.goal: Ensure efficient task handling for comprehensive responses.

sub_agents.name: Retrieval Planner
sub_agents.description: Develops plans for information retrieval based on tasks.
sub_agents.goal: Create effective retrieval strategies for each task.

sub_agents.name: Information Retriever
sub_agents.description: Collects information using various tools based on the retrieval plan.
sub_agents.goal: Gather relevant information to address the user's query.

sub_agents.name: LLM Generator
sub_agents.description: Generates responses using a large language model based on retrieved information.
sub_agents.goal: Produce coherent and accurate responses to user queries.

sub_agents.name: Response Evaluator
sub_agents.description: Evaluates the quality of LLM-generated responses against tasks.
sub_agents.goal: Ensure response accuracy and relevance to user needs.

sub_agents.name: Response Refiner
sub_agents.description: Refines the evaluated responses for improved clarity and completeness.
sub_agents.goal: Deliver polished and user-friendly final responses.

sub_agents.name: Response Collector
sub_agents.description: Gathers all task-specific responses from the database.
sub_agents.goal: Compile comprehensive information for final response generation.

tools.name: Query Analysis Tools
tools.description: Various techniques to analyze and enhance user queries for efficient processing.

tools.name: Task Decomposition Mechanism
tools.description: Breaks complex queries into smaller, manageable sub-tasks.

tools.name: Retrieval Planning Engine
tools.description: Generates detailed plans for information retrieval based on tasks.

tools.name: Information Gathering Tools
tools.description: Suite of tools used to collect data based on the retrieval plan.

tools.name: Response Evaluation Metrics
tools.description: Criteria and methods to assess the quality of generated responses.

workflows.name: MainWorkflow
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow for processing user queries through RAG system components.

steps.description: Receive user query for RAG processing
Augment the query using different analysis techniques for efficient processing
Break down the query into different tasks for efficient handling
Generate a perfect plan for each task
Use different tools to gather information based on the planned retrieval strategy
Store step-wise responses based on plan and task in database
Gather all responses from the database
Generate response using LLM based on retrieved information
Evaluate the LLM-generated response based on the task
Refine the evaluated response for improved clarity and completeness
Output the final refined response to the user
